titles.title: A concurrent resolution correcting the enrollment of H.R. 1827.

action.text: Called up by House by Unanimous Consent.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Voice Vote.

vote.text: Received in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment by Voice Vote.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.

bill.summary: 7/1/1987--Introduced. Makes corrections in the enrollment of H.R. 1827 (Supplemental Appropriations Act, 1987) as it concerns FY 1987 appropriations for U.S. contributions to the International Finance Corporation and the African Development Fund.
